subject: Discovery Call - BigBank Contact Center
content:
Discovery meeting with James Wilson (SVP Ops)

Background:
- BigBank has 2M+ calls per month
- Average cost per call is $8.50
- Board mandate to reduce contact center costs
- Previous chatbot attempt failed - poor containment

Key Pain Points:
- Cost per call too high
- 40% of calls could be deflected to self-service
- Need for 24/7 availability

Budget:
- $500K-$750K allocated for Q1
- Part of larger digital transformation initiative

Timeline:
- Q1 launch target
- Board tracking progress monthly

Next Steps:
- Prototype for account inquiry use case
- Technical architecture review with CTO
